TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IVirtualizedItemProvider

Docs.summary: Exposes a method to support the virtualized item control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider.Realize%2A> method makes a virtual item fully accessible as a UI Automation element. A virtualized item is typically an item in a virtual list; that is, a list that does not manage its own data. When an application retrieves an automation element for a virtualized item by using the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ItemContainerPattern.FindItemByProperty%2A> method, the provider may return a placeholder element that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider> interface. The implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider.Realize%2A> method returns a full UI Automation element reference.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Realize() cil managed

Docs.summary: Makes the virtual item fully accessible as a UI Automation element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When an item is obtained from a virtual list, it is only a placeholder. Use this method to convert it to a full UI Automation element reference.
